participant_1.background:
I bought a set of dice for my favorite tabletop game.
My garden provides a respite from my pain.
i like playing badminton.
i m a graphic designer.
I celebrated my last birthday by creating a series of art pieces to share with my friends and family about the importance of animal welfare.

I enjoy eating homemade bread, which I often make myself.
My height is irrelevant to my legal expertise.
my country is russia.
i am not afraid of what others think.
I try to decorate our home in a way that makes it feel more like a place where we can both relax and feel at home.

content.text: Hello there! How are you today?
I'm doing well! I just celebrated my birthday last weekend and it was a lot of fun.
Happy belated birthday! What did you do for your birthday?
I created a bunch of art pieces for my friends and family about the importance of animal welfare. It was a lot of fun and it's something that I'm passionate about.
That's awesome! I'm sure your friends and family loved them. I'm also passionate about animal welfare, so I think that's great.
Thank you! I'm glad you think so.
What kind of art do you like to create?
I like to create all sorts of art, but I'm mostly into graphic design.
That's cool! I've always been interested in graphic design, but I've never really had the time to learn how to do it.
It's never too late to learn! There are a lot of great resources available online that can help you get started.
I'll have to check that out! Thanks for the tip.
